question_zh: SE - F 系列产品的主要价值是什么？（ ）

A_EN: Only control the start/stop of pumps
B_EN: Achieve comfort and energy savings through pump speed control and equipment start/stop

D_EN: Pumps, chillers or boilers, bypass valves and sensors

B: 直接获得工厂技术支持

question_zh: 以下哪些属于 Armstrong 泵组控制器的产品优势？（ ）
A: 并联泵系统的基于效率的优化控制
B: 先进的多区域控制系统
C: 变流量冷冻水一次泵或二次泵自动化控制
D: 并联无传感器控制（PSPC）技术，最大限度地节约能源
E: 工厂测试和认证，无需现场编程
F: 无法通过外部传感器控制
question_en: Which of the following are the product advantages of Armstrong pump set controllers?
A_EN: Efficiency - based optimization control for parallel pump systems
C_EN: Automated control of variable - flow chilled water primary or secondary pumps
D_EN: Parallel Sensorless Pump Control (PSPC) technology to maximize energy savings
E_EN: Factory - tested and certified, no on - site programming required
F_EN: Cannot be controlled by external sensors

question_en: What aspects may be involved in the upgrade and maintenance of the SE - F series products?

question_en: What unique advantages does the SE - F series controller have compared with similar products of other brands?

question_zh: SE - F 能控制主机的运行台数（ ）
question_en: The SE - F can control the number of operating hosts. ( )

question_zh: Armstrong 泵组控制器不能用于其他品牌的水泵（ ）
question_en: Armstrong pump set controllers cannot be used for pumps of other brands. ( )

question_zh: 一次泵和二次泵的控制产品是完全相同的一款控制产品（ ）
question_en: The control products for primary pumps and secondary pumps are exactly the same. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 最多控制 6 台水泵（ ）
question_en: The SE - F can control at most 6 pumps. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列控制器只能应用于二次泵系统。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series controller can only be applied to secondary pump systems. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列控制器标配的通讯端口一定有以太网端口。（ ）
question_en: The standard communication ports of the SE - F series controller must include an Ethernet port. ( )

question_zh: 在一次泵变流量系统中，SE - F 系列控制器不能控制锅炉数量。（ ）
question_en: In a primary pump variable - flow system, the SE - F series controller cannot control the number of boilers. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列控制器控制泵时只有并联无传感器技术控制这一种方式。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series controller has only one control method, i.e., parallel sensorless technology control, when controlling pumps. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列控制器在二次泵变流量系统中不能控制传感器。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series controller cannot control sensors in a secondary pump variable - flow system. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列产品相比传统产品，在节能方面没有优势。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series products have no energy - saving advantages compared with traditional products. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列产品对楼宇管理系统没有积极作用。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series products have no positive effects on building management systems. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列产品在运维阶段无法远程访问。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series products cannot be remotely accessed during the operation and maintenance stage. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列产品在降低系统成本方面只依靠减少设备数量。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series products only rely on reducing the number of devices to reduce system costs. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列控制器的设置显示没有密码保护。（ ）
question_en: The setting and display of the SE - F series controller have no password protection. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列产品在系统运行过程中不能保障用户舒适度。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series products cannot guarantee user comfort during the system operation process. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列控制器与建筑自动化系统（BAS）连接只能通过串口通信。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series controller can only be connected to a building automation system (BAS) through serial communication. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列控制器在控制多个泵的运行时没有故障自动切换功能。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series controller has no automatic fault - switching function when controlling the operation of multiple pumps. ( )

question_zh: 在 SE - F 系列产品的使用过程中，环境因素对其性能没有影响。（ ）
question_en: During the use of the SE - F series products, environmental factors have no impact on their performance. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列控制器与其他品牌同类产品相比没有独特优势。（ ）
question_en: The SE - F series controller has no unique advantages compared with similar products of other brands. ( )

question_zh: SE - F 系列控制器的 BAS 通讯端口支持的协议不包括 BACnet。（ ）
question_en: The BAS communication port of the SE - F series controller does not support the BACnet protocol. ( )

question_zh: 如下图：制冷系统二次侧的 2 台循环泵应该用哪种控制器？图上的关键区域压差传感器是否能与无传感器控制共用？
question_en: As shown in the figure below: Which controller should be used for the 2 circulating pumps on the secondary side of the refrigeration system? Can the key zone differential pressure sensor in the figure be used together with sensorless control?
answer: SE-F，图上的关键区域压差传感器是能与无传感器控制共用，采用混合控制模式。
